exerciseTagFilter.exerciseTagFilter.filt:
**Functional Purpose**: Label for the tag filter dropdown button.
**UI Location**: Track page → Community Solutions List → Exercise Tag Filter component
**When Users See This**: When the component is rendered, this is the default text on the filter button before any tags are selected.
**Technical Context**: This text is for the filter button. If tags are selected, a count will be appended to this string, like `Filter (2)`.
**Current English**: "Filter"
